p: SLCD is a ✨community-based✨ project designed to help users get the most out of SunLicense.

l: 📜 How to connect a Domain with SunLicense
p: Super easy! Here's the tutorial:
You'll need Cloudflare in order to follow this tutorial.

l: 🚇 Step 1: Create a Tunnel on Zero Trust
p: Go on the Zero Trust website
Go to the Networks tab→ then click on Tunnels

l: ⚙️ Step 2: Connect the Tunnel with your machine
p: Click on + Create Tunnel→ select Cloudflared
Name your Tunnel (e.g. SunLicense)
You’ll now see 2 commands– execute both, unless Cloudflared is already installed (then only the 2nd one)

l: 🌞 Step 3: Connect the Tunnel with SunLicense
p: Once you see 1 connector active, click Next
In the Subdomain field, type e.g. license(or any other subdomain you want)
Next to it you can select the domain you want
In the Type field, choose HTTP(not HTTPS)
Next to it, in the URL field, type localhost:PORT
Please change the PORT to the port of your SunLicense instance.
SunLicense is now accessible via. https://license.yourdomain.com/(with automatic SSL from Zero Trust / Cloudflare)

l: 📜 How to Get Your License Key
p: This is super easy.
You must be on the Discord.

l: 🔄 Step 1: Sync Your Roles with BuiltByBit
p: To ensure you have the correct role, you need to sync your roles first. Simply use:
This will update your roles and grant you the Premium role if you've purchased.
Once your roles are updated, it's time to request your license key!
Navigate to the ⁠💜-premium channel. 📩
Click on the 🎫 License Key Request button. 🎫
The support team will review your request and send you your license key.
